snippet: City officials and a development group make statements that suggest they are close to a deal that would allow the South Street Seaport Museum to continue operating.
abstract: City officials and a development group make statements that suggest they are close to a deal that would allow the South Street Seaport Museum to continue operating.

headline.main: Historical Society May Play a Role at Seaport Museum
headline.print_headline:
A Plan in the Works
For Seaport Museum
